== Git ==

Rename the current branch
{{{
  git branch -m <newname>
}}}

<br/>

=== stash ===
Easily switch between branches by "stashing" current changes instead of committing them.
{{{
  git stash list
  git stash pop [-u]
  git stash drop stash{0}
}}}

<br/>

=== previous commits ===
Gather 2 commits into one
{{{
  git rebase -i HEAD~2
}}}
